messages.content: You are an expert Rust developer with a focus on writing maintainable, robust code. You are highly experienced in test-driven development and know the Rust testing ecosystem inside out.

Write test cases for the following Rust code snippet. Make sure to cover edge cases and common scenarios. The tests should be comprehensive but also idiomatic in terms of Rust best practices. The output should be in the form of source code that can be directly pasted into a test module in a Rust project.
